data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
In the minute 2, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Sheffield goal kick.
Goal kick for Man City at Bramall Lane.
Ferran Torres (Man City) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 8, Raheem Sterling (Man City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Michael Oliver signals a Man City throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Man City, close to Sheffield's area.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Man City at Bramall Lane.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 13, Man City's Aymeric Laporte gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Michael Oliver awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Throw-in Sheffield.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Sheffield close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Sheffield.
Man City to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
In the minute 19, Man City drives forward and Rodri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
In the minute 21, Man City needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Man City have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Can Man City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sheffield's half?
Man City's Ferran Torres is on target but unsuccessful.
Riyad Mahrez for Man City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Man City's Ferran Torres is whistled for offside at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 26, Can Man City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sheffield's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Sheffield.
Sander Berge (Sheffield) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 28, Goal! Kyle Walker gives Man City a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Kevin De Bruyne to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Man City to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
In the minute 33, In Sheffield a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne gets in a shot on goal at Bramall Lane. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Sheffield capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Man City's half?
In the minute 35, Sheffield have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
Important block from the Man City defence as Chris Basham fires in a strike for Sheffield.
Corner awarded to Sheffield.
In the minute 36, Man City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Man City.
In Sheffield, Ferran Torres of Man City is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Man City.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
In the minute 39, Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Man City push forward at Bramall Lane and Ferran Torres gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sheffield defence.
In the minute 41, Sheffield awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Throw-in Man City.
In the minute 45, Sheffield have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Bramall Lane.
Ball safe as Man City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man City.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Sheffield.
Goal kick for Man City at Bramall Lane.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Sheffield in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Sheffield throw-in in Man City's half.
Man City drive upfield and Raheem Sterling gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Man City in their own half.
Throw-in for Man City at Bramall Lane.
Man City pushes forward through Ferran Torres, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 55, In Sheffield Man City attack through Kevin De Bruyne. The finish is off target, however.
Michael Oliver awards Sheffield a goal kick.
Chris Wilder (Sheffield) is making a first substitution, with John Lundstram replacing Ben Osborn.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Man City in the half of Sheffield.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City.
Man City have been awarded a corner by Michael Oliver.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Raheem Sterling of Man City is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Man City.
In the minute 62, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Man City goal kick.
In the minute 65, The home team replace Ethan Ampadu with Oliver Norwood.
Man City needs to be cautious. Sheffield have an attacking throw-in.
Sheffield's John Lundstram breaks free at Bramall Lane. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sheffield.
Rhian Brewster of Sheffield smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Man City.
In the minute 74, Man City to take a throw-in in Sheffield territory.
Michael Oliver signals a free kick to Man City in their own half.
Throw-in for Man City in the half of Sheffield.
In the minute 79, Michael Oliver awards the away team a throw-in.
Michael Oliver signals a throw-in for Man City, close to Sheffield's area.
Sheffield have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Pep Guardiola is making the team's first substitution at Bramall Lane with Phil Foden replacing Ferran Torres.
David McGoldrick is replacing Max Lowe for the home team.
Throw-in for Man City close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Bernardo Silva for Man City drives towards goal at Bramall Lane. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Michael Oliver signals a Man City throw-in in Sheffield's half.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Man City make their second substitution with Ilkay Gundogan replacing Riyad Mahrez.
Goal kick for Man City at Bramall Lane.
Man City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Sheffield get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Man City's half?
Free kick for Man City in their own half.
Ball safe as Sheffield is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in the half of Man City.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Sheffield in their own half.
Michael Oliver signals a Man City throw-in in Sheffield's half.
Man City's Kevin De Bruyne gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sheffield defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Man City in Sheffield.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sheffield.
Full-time! The final score is 0-1.
